text: @WhiteHouse @Mike_Pence @FDAgov Trump has no words to Americans that had 4500 family members die today due to Coronavirus ? It’s only April. Trumps more concerned w/his political standing than  escalating death rates in Red States? Maybe those Republican voters lives don’t matter? Is it just collateral damage?
